narrative_title: Solar Panel Manufacturing Driving Silver Demand

evidence.text: Global solar panel production hits record highs as governments accelerate renewable energy targets. Silver demand for photovoltaic cells expected to surge 40% this year according to Silver Institute report.
China and India's aggressive solar capacity expansion plans could consume an additional 100 million ounces of silver annually by 2025. Supply concerns mounting.
DD: Why solar silver demand is the most underpriced commodity trade of 2024. Production can't keep up with panel manufacturing growth.
First Solar announces 10GW expansion requiring significant silver procurement. Stock jumps 12% on renewable energy momentum.
Silver spot price up 3.2% on solar manufacturing demand. Industrial buyers scrambling for supply. This is the beginning of the solar silver super cycle.
